examples.example: 我们应该在乎那些真正关爱我们的人，并珍惜与他们在一起的时光。

translate.english: We should care about those who really care about us and cherish the time spent with them.

examples.example: 我很在乎朋友们的感受，总是尽力去理解和支持他们。

translate.english: I care very much about the feelings of my friends and always try my best to understand and support them.

examples.example: 我非常在乎我们之间的友谊，会一直用心去维护。

translate.english: I care very much about the friendship between us and will always maintain it with heart.
